name: Forest Below (itch)
description:
Forest Below is a zen turn-based puzzle game made to introduce you to the world beneath trees.

Using Forest Below's unique mechanics, you will draw the paths of your roots through a series of challenging levels. It is up to you to manage roots paths and water resources so you can collect enough water to grow.

  === FEATURES ======

  • Unique puzzle mechanic: simple branch draw mechanic to collect water each turn
  • Beautiful, painterly art-style
  • Easy to navigate user interface
  • Relaxing environmental puzzles
  • Completely free to play! No micro-transactions or internal currencies

=== BACKGROUND ===

You are the last child born to the Great Forest. Disaster strikes, and every sacred tree has been destroyed. The land the trees grew from has been tainted and taken over by dangerous creatures that have eaten up the roots. You and your many siblings of the Great Forest are now without a home.

Yet all is not lost.

As the last child of the Great Forest, you have been gifted with the ability to control trees. With this power and knowledge, you set off on your quest to grow new homes for each and every one of your displaced kin. The bigger and healthier the trees are means the better they are for your brothers and sisters.

Be the savior of the forest. Grow your roots wisely…
